_meta.title: Random start-goal baseline success-rate comparison (6 baselines, forest_a only)
_meta.summary: Compare A*, A*-MPC, Hybrid A*, Hybrid A*-MPC, RRT*, and RRT-MPC on forest_a under random start-goal evaluation.
notes: Forest-only single-map profile for focused comparison on forest_a.
Uses --baselines all, which expands to astar + hybrid_astar + rrt_star.
Outputs include per-run and mean KPI tables with success_rate for six baseline rows (planner + MPC tracking).
